CFBD Players Endpoint

cfbd_players.Rd

CFBD Players Endpoint

Player Information Search

Player Returning Production

Player Usage

cfbd_player_info(
  search_term,
  position = NULL,
  team = NULL,
  year = NULL,
  verbose = FALSE
)

cfbd_player_returning(
  year = 2019,
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  verbose = FALSE
)

cfbd_player_usage(
  year = 2019,
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  position = NULL,
  athlete_id = NULL,
  excl_garbage_time = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

search_term

(String required): Search term for the player you are trying to look up
position

(string optional): Position of the player you are searching for.
Position Group - options include:

  • Offense: QB, RB, FB, TE, OL, G, OT, C, WR

  • Defense: DB, CB, S, LB, DE, DT, NT, DL

  • Special Teams: K, P, LS, PK
team

(String optional): Team - Select a valid team, D1 football
year

(Integer required, default 2019): Year, 4 digit format (YYYY).
verbose

Logical parameter (TRUE/FALSE, default: FALSE) to return warnings and messages from function
conference

(String optional): Conference abbreviation - Select a valid FBS conference
Conference abbreviations P5: ACC, B12, B1G, SEC, PAC
Conference abbreviations G5 and FBS Independents: CUSA, MAC, MWC, Ind, SBC, AAC
athlete_id

(Integer optional): Athlete ID filter for querying a single athlete
Can be found using the cfbfastR::cfbd_player_info() function.
excl_garbage_time

(Logical default FALSE): Select whether to exclude Garbage Time (TRUE/FALSE)

Source

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/player/search

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/player/returning

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/player/usage

Value

cfbfastR::cfbd_player_info() - A data frame with 12 variables:

athlete_id

character. Unique player identifier athlete_id.

team

character. Team of the player.

name

character. Player name.

first_name

character. Player first name.

last_name

character. Player last name.

weight

integer. Player weight.

height

integer. Player height.

jersey

integer. Player jersey number.

position

character. Player position.

home_town

character. Player home town.

team_color

character. Player team color.

team_color_secondary

character. Player team secondary color.

cfbfastR::cfbd_player_returning() - A data frame with 15 variables:

season

integer.

team

character.

conference

character.

total_ppa

double.

total_passing_ppa

double.

total_receiving_ppa

double.

total_rushing_ppa

double.

percent_ppa

double.

percent_passing_ppa

double.

percent_receiving_ppa

double.

percent_rushing_ppa

double.

usage

double.

passing_usage

double.

receiving_usage

double.

rushing_usage

double.

cfbfastR::cfbd_player_usage() - A data frame with 14 variables:

season

integer.

athlete_id

character.

name

character.

position

character.

team

character.

conference

character.

usg_overall

double.

usg_pass

double.

usg_rush

double.

usg_1st_down

double.

usg_2nd_down

double.

usg_3rd_down

double.

usg_standard_downs

double.

usg_passing_downs

double.

Examples

# \donttest{
cfbd_player_info(search_term = "James", position = "DB", team = "Florida State", year = 2017)

#>   athlete_id          team         name first_name last_name weight height
#> 1    3691739 Florida State Derwin James     Derwin     James    211     75
#>   jersey position   home_town team_color team_color_secondary
#> 1      3       DB Leander, TX    #782F40              #ceb888

cfbd_player_info(search_term = "Lawrence", team = "Clemson")

#>   athlete_id    team            name first_name last_name weight height jersey
#> 1    4360310 Clemson Trevor Lawrence     Trevor  Lawrence    220     78     16
#>   position        home_town team_color team_color_secondary
#> 1       QB Cartersville, GA    #F66733              #522d80
# }

# \donttest{
cfbd_player_returning(year = 2019, team = "Florida State")

#>   season          team conference total_ppa total_passing_ppa
#> 1   2019 Florida State        ACC     189.9              74.3
#>   total_receiving_ppa total_rushing_ppa percent_ppa percent_passing_ppa
#> 1               116.5              -0.9       0.583               0.513
#>   percent_receiving_ppa percent_rushing_ppa usage passing_usage receiving_usage
#> 1                 0.611               0.096 0.541         0.415           0.717
#>   rushing_usage
#> 1         0.591
# }

# \donttest{
cfbd_player_usage(year = 2019, position = "WR", team = "Florida State")

#>   season athlete_id               name position          team conference
